timeline.bodyText:
Based on the documentation of apply() method and lack of issues I suggest to use it over commit()

You don't need to worry about Android component lifecycles and their interaction with apply() writing to disk. The framework makes sure in-flight disk writes from apply() complete before switching states.

source: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/content/SharedPreferences.Editor#apply()
